LinkedInTips.Name: Setup Job Alerts
LinkedInTips.Explanation: Job alerts are used to notify you about new job openings.

LinkedInTips.Name: Set Viewing Options
LinkedInTips.Explanation: This will determine what people see when you view their profile. I'd recommend private mode.
Instructions: Select "Private mode" (or whatever mode you want people to see when you view their profile)
Click the back button once done.

LinkedInTips.Name: Try LinkedIn Premium for Free
LinkedInTips.Explanation: LinkedIn premium isn't worth the money in my opinion. However, LinkedIn does give you one month free, so I'd definitely recommend trying it out and coming to your own conclusions.
